overview: A heartwarming public television series, "Dooley & Pals" proves that Earthlings and aliens can co-exist peacefully, even happily. Meet extra-terrestrial Dooley (David Mada) and his robot friend M.A.R.T.I.E. (Michael Stevens), the stars of this fun-filled show featuring live segments, 3-D animation, drawings and more. The pair befriend the children in a small-town neighborhood and learn valuable lessons about kindness, cooperation and friendship.
title: The Dooley & Pals Show
